name: The Greatest Hero
description:
HOW GREAT!!!! You are not the hero in this story!!!

Today your only mission is to sidekick the main hero, we hope that you can find great adventures with him!

To that, you are now responsible for the bag full of equipment, in there you will find:

"The Flame Tongue" - the finest sword of fire.

"The  Ice Breaker" -  the coldest of the swords.

"The GrassHopper" - Just to complete three of them.

3x Potions of healing.

Just remember that the lowlands are filled with slimes and in the future more creatures, make sure that you will help the true hero in this quest. 

!!!Remember!!!

The grass Slimes are afraid of fire!

The Ice Slimes are afraid of the grass!

The Fire Slimes are afraid of water!
